properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.base-packages
properties.description: Base packages to scan for GraphQL annotations.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.base-packages
properties.description: Base packages to scan for GraphQL annotations. If empty, the main application package will be used.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.enabled
properties.description: Whether GraphQL AutoGen is enabled.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.enabled
properties.description: Whether GraphQL auto-generation is enabled. Default: true

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.exclude-packages
properties.description: Packages to exclude from scanning. Useful for excluding test packages or third-party libraries.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.format-schema
properties.description: Whether to format the generated schema.graphqls file. Default: true

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.generate-inputs
properties.description: Whether to automatically generate input types.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.generate-inputs
properties.description: Whether to automatically generate Input types (CreateXXXInput, UpdateXXXInput). Default: true

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.generate-payloads
properties.description: Whether to automatically generate payload types for mutations.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.generate-payloads
properties.description: Whether to automatically generate payload types for mutations. Default: true

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.generate-subscriptions
properties.description: Whether to generate subscriptions.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.generation-mode
properties.description: Mode for schema generation. STARTUP: Generate at application startup BUILD_TIME: Generate during build (requires plugin) Default: STARTUP

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.include-java-doc
properties.description: Whether to include JavaDoc comments as GraphQL descriptions. Default: true

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.introspection.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable GraphQL introspection. Should be disabled in production.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.introspection.playground
properties.description: Whether to enable GraphQL playground/GraphiQL. Should be disabled in production.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.introspection.playground-path
properties.description: Path for GraphQL playground.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.naming-strategy
properties.description: Naming strategy for GraphQL types and fields.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.naming-strategy
properties.description: Naming strategy for GraphQL types and fields. Possible values: CAMEL_CASE, PASCAL_CASE, SNAKE_CASE Default: CAMEL_CASE

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.performance.batch-size
properties.description: Default batch size for DataLoaders.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.performance.cache-size
properties.description: Cache size for type resolution.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.performance.enable-async
properties.description: Whether to enable async processing.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.performance.enable-dataloader
properties.description: Whether to enable DataLoader for batch loading.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.schema-location
properties.description: Location where the generated schema.graphqls file should be written. Default: "classpath:graphql/"

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.schema.auto-reload
properties.description: Whether to auto-reload schema when annotations change.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.schema.file-name
properties.description: Name of the generated schema file.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.schema.generate-at-startup
properties.description: Whether to generate schema file at startup.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.schema.location
properties.description: Location where to generate the schema file.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.sort-schema
properties.description: Whether to sort types and fields alphabetically in the generated schema. Default: true

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.type-mapping
properties.description: Custom type mappings from Java types to GraphQL scalar names.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.type-mapping
properties.description: Custom type mappings from Java types to GraphQL scalar names. Example: LocalDateTime -> DateTime, BigDecimal -> Decimal

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.validate-schema
properties.description: Whether to validate the generated schema for consistency. Default: true

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.validation.enable-bean-validation
properties.description: Whether to enable Bean Validation integration.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.validation.fail-on-validation-error
properties.description: Whether to fail fast on validation errors.

properties.name: spring.graphql.autogen.validation.validate-schema-at-startup
properties.description: Whether to validate GraphQL schema at startup.
